kalaya gewi yana atharathura ma not kala eka deyak atha.kalanige bella sama thathpara thiha hathalihakata warakma watayak karake(watayak kiwwata mema watayata anshaka 180 ki) aththama kiyathoth eeka marama bellakya.samaharawita aawarthiya kiyakarithwayak athi motarayak hayi karagena sitinawa wiya yuthuya.naththam melahakatath ehi "pota" gos thibiya yuthuya.(pota kohe yannedayi noasanna.eewa thahanam prashnaya) rawinduge bellada ee ha samana sankhyathayakin eha meha wana bawa pene,eya uuta ganak nathi seya.eya ese wiya yuthuya.manda kollange beli wala pota yanne natha.mama eya athdakimenma danimi.

sabawinma apa jiwathwana samajaya thula lingika aadaraye hadaya thiranaya kerenuye hudek swabhawika lingika aakarshanaya wisin nowe.dhaneshwara yatharthayak thula samajaye panthika sthawarathwaya,wathkama ha aarthika hakiyawa yana karunu wisin aadaraya yanu kumakdayi arthanirupanaya karanu labanneya.lingika aalaya nam swabhawika prapanchaya roma wahal samaja thula wikruthiyak ha wibhramayak bawata pathwuye yam seda,eya nuthana dhanawadi samaja wala ,wenath aakarayakin wuwada, nawathath wikruthiyak lesa wirupi aakarayakin prakashayata pathwa thibe./uota meka therennaththan sadda nathuwa indapan wada nodi.

danatamath gowijana sanwardhana madhyasthana mulkaragena krushikarma paryeshana saha nishpadana sahakarawarunge sambandhikaranayen hadunagena athi aadarsha gewathu 125,000k sthapitha wadasatahana da paswana adiyara samangama aarambha aarambha wiya.sama gramasewa wasamakma aawaranaya wana paridi thoragath gruha eekaka wisipan lakshayak sandaha warga 7kin samanwitha elawalu bija kattalayak da warga hatharayan samanwitha elawalu pala 9k da samangin palathuru pala, pol pala, kulubadu boga pala, aushadha palada wishesha bogayak lesa kathuru murunga palada janathawa wetha labadimata katayuthu kara atha.diwi naguma wadasatahana sandaha laksha 25kata adhika janathawak sambandhawana athara pasuwiparam wadasatahanak da aarthika sanwardhana niladharin athulu gramasewa wasame pahasu karakayin mangin danatamath kriyathmaka we.

eksath jathika peramuna ha drawida jathika sandhanayata me wana wita parlimenthuwe manthri dhura 117k pawathina athara ee anuwa owunta parlimenthuwe bahutharaya athi heyin mese manthriwarun thama parshwayata sambandha kara ganimata eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata sambandha parshwa katayuthu karamin sitina bawa wartha weyi.
"mona wennada nana, wenna thiyana hama deyakma una.
mona tharam darunu thrasthawadin aparadhakarayin wunath owun kage hari daruwo, kage hari sahodarayo, ithin ee mawpiyanta sahodarayinta owun samarannata ayithiyak nadda?
me aakarayata tiken tika biyar gana yahapath adahasak sitha thula athi kara ganimata haki wiya.
ee widiyata mulinma labune densil pi.
thamuseta mara almakne thiyenne, hoda hithin gihin athulen ida gannawa"

rathnapura wewalwaththa margaye sathapum 15 pamana dura gaman kala wita meyapene.emenma balangoda sita wewalwaththa haraha rathnapurayata paminenawitada mema diya alla daka gatha hakiya.mema diyaalla pihitiye pahala gama sahaamunuthanna yana gam dekaka mayima thula wana athara mema alle aarambhayawashayen salakiya hakke 'gas labu ala'nam wu kuda diya paharaki.meyadehena kanda gama haraha ' dehena dola 'namin galawith uda amunuthanne sita pahalata ada halena athara eya kotas dekakin yuktha we.memadiya alla adi 243k pamana wethayi salake.
"oyage koppe kalekata passe mama parissam karala duwata dunna.."
